formula: a(n)=(sum(k=1..n/2, (-1)^(k)*sum(i=2*k..n, binomial(n,i)*(stirling1(i,2*k)*(2*k)^(n-i)*(-1)^(n-i))))), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else (sum((-1)^(k)*sum(binomial(n,i)*(stirling1(i,2*k)*(2*k)^(n-i)*(-1)^(n-i)),i,2*k,n),k,1,n/2)); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs Mar 15 1997 by _Olivier GÃ©rard_.
